original_title: Tito & Tarantula: Live at Crossroads - Rockpalast 2008
overview: Crossroads - Bonn, Harmonie - 24. October 2008  Tito Larriva: vocals, guitar  Steven Hufsteter: guitar, backing vocals  Caroline "Lucy Laloca" Rippy: bass, backing vocals  Alfredo Ortis: drums, backing vocals
title: Tito & Tarantula: Live at Crossroads - Rockpalast 2008
